summary: REQ-3 appears largely implemented: 3 color scheme suggestions are provided (with one selected) and the default palette is applied by updating CSS variable theme tokens in frontend/src/index.css for both light (:root) and dark (.dark), including primary/secondary/accent/muted/background/foreground/border/ring/destructive/success plus chart/sidebar tokens. Some additional, unrequested project/meta changes and a radius adjustment were also included.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed global border radius token (--radius) to 0.75rem as part of the theme update.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 focuses on updating the color palette via theme tokens; changing sizing/shape (radius) is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a project-level/project management state file update (project_state.json) marking/adding feature request tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is theming changes and providing scheme suggestions; project tracking metadata updates are not requested.
Not requested by REQ-3; appears to be an auxiliary summary file unrelated to implementing the theme tokens.
